text:
Vita.io | Backend Developer | Rotterdam, Netherlands | FULL_TIME, ONSITE, REMOTE, http://vita.io

Vita.io wants everybody to be happy at work!

We uses conversations and activities based on the principles of positive psychology to bring happiness to individuals and teams and help them become more successful.

Backend stack: Clojure, Postgresql, ElasticSearch, GCE, Docker, Gitlab CI Frontend stack: React-Native, Redux

Positions:

- Backend developer: improve our chatbot using NLP and ML (node.js, Clojure and/or Python)

- Frontend developer: create data-visuals for customers and continue developing our mobile app (React-Native)

We live by our mantra and will do everything in our power to make you an happy employee!

Work where, when and how you want. Equity and benefits available.

https://magnet.me/a/company/vita.io/opportunities
